data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Please note this is a duplicate of an earlier request I never acted
    on, posted several months ago. This time I'm uploading concurrently.

    The module uses a stored lexicon and some probability data to
    assign part-of-speech (POS) tags to English text. It greatly
    facilitates tasks like finding proper names, nouns, and noun
    phrases, all useful for building search engines. The POS tags are
    XML-style, and correspond to standard usage in the field.

    The namespace choice should be self-evident.
